original_title: MoPE and CEB to launch separate inquiries into island-wide power outage
original_body_lines: State Minister of Power and Energy Indika Anuruddha states that two separate inquiries will be carried out by the Ministry of Power and Energy and the Ceylon Electricity  Board (CEB) into the island-wide power breakdown that occurred yesterday (09).
The State Minister revealed this while speaking in the Parliament this morning (Dec. 10).
